atempt something against them"replied Windlord

ct: Re: Maximals - Ark Medbay







Tucson nods.


" She was, but she was =
sent out of the room, due to some emotional instability on my part.  Leo Pr=
ime thought it was best not to endanger anyone and he was correct in his ju=
dgement.  I will not lie, I have a weakness and it's my temper compounded b=
y the temperament of my beast form.  I sense there were issues on the old d=
ragon's part that never were resolved.  And now those issues are mine.  But=
 I will do my best to control my temper.  Now as far as assistance goes, ye=
s I would be honored if you would help in the search for our missing comrad=
es.  Which ever task you want, feel free to take it on.  And I welcome ever=
yone's input on this too. "

Perpetually on the move and constantly busy. 
=

On Aug 24, 2011, at 7:35 PM, Airshadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> w=
rote:

I tought that Straighshot would go to stay with Nightlight and elita, in or=
der to avoid tjat Rodimus attempt to abduct them and give them some confort=
"said Windlord
